title: Stardust, Starlust
description: Flowerdance--It is Tundora's initiation into the temple of love that evening, but the ceremony does not quite proceed as planned.... Moondust--After an asteroid damages her transport pod, Narida wakes up on an alien world and finds love and sex like she's never known.... Timewarp--After discovering their sexual attraction for each other, Jan and her co-pilot are hurled into a timewarp.... Incunabula--Cassandra's ship has been lost in space for a long time. Now that their supplies are gone, she and her crew face death. But their ship is suddenly pulled toward an ice planet. She wakes up naked in an ice cavern.... The Scarlet Star--Sharin has a strange dream. She slides down a rainbow--a beautiful naked man waiting for her at the end, ready to take her.... [Explicit Content]
author: Gabriella Bradley
